configuration.title: Roo Code
commands.allowedCommands.description: Commands that can be auto-executed when 'Always approve execute operations' is enabled
commands.deniedCommands.description: Command prefixes that will be automatically denied without asking for approval. In case of conflicts with allowed commands, the longest prefix match takes precedence. Add * to deny all commands.
commands.commandExecutionTimeout.descrip: Maximum time in seconds to wait for command execution to complete before timing out (0 = no timeout, 1-600s, default: 0s)
commands.commandTimeoutAllowlist.descrip: Command prefixes that are excluded from the command execution timeout. Commands matching these prefixes will run without timeout restrictions.
Prevent task completion when there are incomplete todos in the todo list
settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.descripti: Settings for VSCode Language Model API
settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.vendor.de: The vendor of the language model (e.g. copilot)
settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.family.de: The family of the language model (e.g. gpt-4)
settings.customStoragePath.description: Custom storage path. Leave empty to use the default location. Supports absolute paths (e.g. 'D:\RooCodeStorage')
settings.autoImportSettingsPath.descript: Path to a RooCode configuration file to automatically import on extension startup. Supports absolute paths and paths relative to the home directory (e.g. '~/Documents/roo-code-settings.json'). Leave empty to disable auto-import.
settings.maximumIndexedFilesForFileSearc: Maximum number of files to index for the @ file search feature. Higher values provide better search results in large projects but may use more memory. Default: 10,000.
settings.useAgentRules.description: Enable loading of AGENTS.md files for agent-specific rules (see https://agent-rules.org/)
settings.apiRequestTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for API responses (0 = no timeout, 1-3600s, default: 600s). Higher values are recommended for local providers like LM Studio and Ollama that may need more processing time.
settings.newTaskRequireTodos.description: Require todos parameter when creating new tasks with the new_task tool
settings.codeIndex.embeddingBatchSize.de: The batch size for embedding operations during code indexing. Adjust this based on your API provider's limits. Default is 60.
settings.debug.description: Enable debug mode to show additional buttons for viewing API conversation history and UI messages as prettified JSON in temporary files.
settings.debugProxy.enabled.description: **Enable Debug Proxy** — Route all outbound network requests through a proxy for MITM debugging. Only active when running in debug mode (F5).
settings.debugProxy.serverUrl.descriptio: Proxy URL (e.g., `http://127.0.0.1:8888`). Only used when **Debug Proxy** is enabled.
settings.debugProxy.tlsInsecure.descript: Accept self-signed certificates from the proxy. **Required for MITM inspection.** ⚠️ Insecure — only use for local debugging.
Enable hybrid search combining keyword and semantic matching for code indexing
settings.codeIndex.hybridSearch.descript: Hybrid search settings combining keyword and semantic matching for improved code indexing results
settings.codeIndex.hybridSearch.semantic: Weight for semantic search results in hybrid search (0-1). Higher values prioritize semantic similarity.
settings.codeIndex.hybridSearch.keywordW: Weight for keyword search results in hybrid search (0-1). Higher values prioritize exact keyword matches.
settings.codeIndex.hybridSearch.rrfK.des: K parameter for Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF). Controls the ranking fusion between keyword and semantic search results.
settings.codeIndex.adaptiveChunking.desc: Adaptive chunking settings for intelligent code segmentation based on language structure
settings.codeIndex.adaptiveChunking.enab: Enable adaptive chunking that adjusts code segmentation based on language structure and content
settings.codeIndex.adaptiveChunking.stra: Chunking strategy: 'syntactic' (based on code syntax), 'semantic' (based on semantic meaning), or 'balanced' (combination of both)
settings.context.compression.description: Context compression settings for managing conversation context size
settings.context.compression.enabled.des: Enable context compression to manage conversation context size and token usage
